attributes.action: Do More To Help Homeless People Who Are British Born
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im no racist but i see loads of people who come from other countries recieving so much help and support from our governments that they get more than our own citizens do. we are supposed to be equal but i dont see it at all!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
